disclosure: Shareuhack is reader-supported. When you buy through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission.
whatWeDoDescript: We are keen to research, share and test practical tech and hacks to help you do everything efficiently. Help you become lifehacker!
howWeDoDescript: For each article, we will do enough homework, including a lot of reading articles, actual viewing courses, expert interviews, etc., to ensure that the content we produce is up to date.

knowledge.title: Smart Learning
knowledge.description: Efficient learning is very important, especially when you want to do a lot of things, don't make your own wheels, stand directly on the shoulders of giants!

life.title: Life Hacks
life.description: All actions that humans do while they are alive are life. Have the courage to improve and optimize your life, and discover new things you never thought of!

money.title: Money Game
money.description: Invest smartly to realize the freedom of wealth; expand business horizons and cultivate the thinking of getting rich!

work.title: Career Survial Kit
work.description: Working 40 hours a week, whether it is looking for a job, changing jobs, improving work efficiency, managing upward or downward, any good change will have a huge impact!

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Project management is the process of leading the work of a team to achieve all project goals within the given constraints.

investment.title: Money & Investment
investment.description: To invest means owning an asset or an item with the goal of generating income from the investment or the appreciation of your investment which is an increase in the value of the asset over a period of time.

entrepreneurship.title: Entrepreneurship
entrepreneurship.description: Entrepreneurship is the creation or extraction of value.

travel.title: Travel
travel.description: Life is a journey. What you care about is not the destination, but the scenery and mood along the way.

productivity.title: Productivity
productivity.description: Take the least effort and produce the greatest value.

lifePhilosophy.title: Life Philosophy
lifePhilosophy.description: Make your life a real life, not just survival.

education.title: Education
education.description: Education is the process of facilitating learning, or the acquisition of knowledge, skills, values, morals, beliefs, habits, and personal development.
